ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
PrecisOrder prescribing an additional period during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to The Hon. GARY W. TRANMER, who was required to relocate to the City of Sault Ste. Marie following his appointment as a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario on May 10, 2007.
